name: avalanche
caption: Avalanche

effect.short: Inflicts double damage if the user takes damage before attacking this turn.
effect.full:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  If the target damaged the user this turn and was the last to do so, this move has double power.

[]{move:pain-split} does not count as damaging the user.

flavorText:
The power of this attack move is doubled if the user
has been hurt by the target in the same turn.
